dialogue.describe: Oh man, I want to burn it so bad…
dialogue.offer: I'm so angry! I have an enemy that ruined my life, and I want revenge! I don't care about <the_cataclysm>, I just want to burn his house! Would you help me?
dialogue.accepted: Good. Let's go to his house and burn it down! Oh, by the way, could you bring gasoline with you? I was so angry I forgot to bring it with me…
dialogue.advice: Maybe we can find some gasoline at gas station.
dialogue.success: Sweet, sweet revenge! It smells so nice! All his stuff, and probably even himself, will burn to ashes in a matter of minutes.  You helped me get my revenge, so I'll follow you to the end, my friend!
